lead_paragraph: After three straight losses delayed their playoff clinching, the San Jose Sharks made it back to the postseason with the kind of performance that could carry them far this spring.

headline.print_headline: Thornton Helps Sharks Clinch Playoffs With 5-2 Win vs. Kings
headline.main: Thornton Helps Sharks Clinch Playoffs With 5-2 Win vs. Kings

snippet: After three straight losses delayed their playoff clinching, the San Jose Sharks made it back to the postseason with the kind of performance that could carry them far this spring....
